verses.padam: (Padam) pAkayajñamiti# pAka - yajñam|vai|anviti|Ahi̍tAgnErityAhi̍ta̍ - agnEḥ|paśavaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|iḍA̱|Kalu̍|vai|pAkayajña̍ iti# pAka - yajñaḥ|sA|EṣA|antarA|prayAjAnUyAjAniti# prayAja - anUyAjAn|yajamAnasya|lOkE|ava̍hitEyava̍# - hitA|tAm|AhriyamAṇAmityA̱̍ - hriyamAṇAm|aBIti̍|mantrayEta|surU̍pavaṛṣavarṇa̍ iti surUpa̍ -varq.ṣavarṇE|Eti|ihi|iti̍|paśava̍ḥ|vai|iḍA̱|paśUn|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|yajñam|vai|dEvAḥ|adu̍hrann|yajñaḥ|asu̍rAn|aduhat|tE|asu̍rAḥ|yajñadu̍gdhA̍ iti# yajña - dugdhAḥ|parEti|aBavann|yaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|dOha̱m|vidvAn|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAkayajñaM ~MvA anvAhitAgnEḥ̍ paśava upa# tiṣṭhanta iḍA Kalu vai pAkayajñaḥ̍ saiṣA&ntarA prayAjAnUyAjAn.̍ yajamAnasya̍ lOkE&vahitA̍ tAmA̱hriyamAṇAmaBi̍ mantrayEta̍ surUpavaṛṣavarṇa̍ EhIti# paśavO vA iḍA# paśUnEvOpa# hvayatE yajñaM ~Mvai dEvA aduhran.̍ yajñO&surAṃ̍ aduhat tE&surA̍ qjñadugdhAḥ̍ parA&Bavanq.̍ yO vai yajñasya dOhaM̍ ~MvidvAn - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) yajatE|apIti̍|anyam|yaja̍mAnam|duhE|sA|mE|satyA|AśIrityA̱-śIḥ|asya|yajñasya̍|BUyAt|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|dOha̍ḥ|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|duhE|prattA̱|vai|gauḥ|duhE|prattA̱|iḍA̱|yaja̍mAnAya|duhE|EtE|vai|iḍA̍yai|stanA̱ḥ|iḍA̱|upa̍hUtEtyupa̍# - hUtA|iti|vAyuḥ|vathsaḥ|yaṛhi̍|hOtA̱|iḍA̱m|upahvayatEtyu̍pa̍ - hvayEta|taṛhi̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|hOtA̍ram|Ikṣa̍mAṇaḥ|vAyum|mana̍sA|dhyAyEt|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajatE&pyanyaM ~MyajamAnaM̍ duhE sA mE# satyA&&śIrasya yajñasya# BUyAdityAhaiṣa̍ vai yajñasya dOhastEnaivainaM̍ duhE prattA vai gaurduhE̍ prattEḍA yajamAnAya̍ duha EtE vA iḍAyai̍ stanA iḍOpahUtEti̍# vAyurvathsO yaṛhi hOtEḍAmupahvayE̍ta̍ taṛhi yajamAnO̍ hOtAramIkṣa̍mAṇO̍ vAyuM manasA̍ dhyAyEn-[ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) mAtrE|vathsam|upAvasRujatItyu̍pa̍ - avasRujati|sarvE̍ṇa|vai|yajñEna̍|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|pAkayajñEnEti# pAka-yajñEna|manu̍ḥ|aśrAmyat|sA|iḍA̱|manu̱m|upAva̍rtatEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartata|tAm|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva - asurAḥ|vIti|ahvayanta|pratIcI̱m|dEvAḥ|parA̍cIm|asu̍rAḥ|sA|dEvAn|upAva̍rtatEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartata|paśava̍ḥ|vai|tat|dEvAn|avRuṇata|paśava̍ḥ|asu̍rAn|ajahuḥ|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|parA̍cIm|tasya̍|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayEta|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAtrE vathsa-mupAvasRujati̍ sarvEṇa̍ vai yajñEna# dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ pAkayajñEna manuraśrAmyathsEḍA̍ manumupAva̍rtata̍ tAM dEvAsurA̍ vyahvayanta̍ pratIcI̱M dEvAḥ parAcImasu̍rAḥ̍ sA dEvAnupAvartata̍ paśavO vai tad dEvAnavRuṇata̍ paśavO&surAnajahuryaM̍ kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAditi parAcIM̍ tasyEḍAmupa# hvayEtApaśurEva Bavati̍ yaM-[ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) kAmayEta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|pratIcI̱m|tasya̍|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayEta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayEta|yaḥ|iḍA̱m|upahUyEtyu̍pa̍ - hUya|AtmAna̱m|iḍA̍yAm|upahvayEtEtyu̍pa̍ - hvayEta|iti̍|sA|naḥ|priyA|supratU̱rtiriti̍# su - pratU̱rtiḥ|maGOnI̱|iti|Aha|iḍA̱m|Eva|upahUyEtyu̍pa̍ - hUya|AtmAna̱m|iḍA̍yAm|upEti̍|hvayatE|vya̍stamiti̍ vi-astam|iva|vai|Etat|yajñasya|yat|iḍA̱|sAmi|prAśnantIti̍# pra - aśnanti|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAditi# pratIcIM tasyEḍA-mupa# hvayEta paśumAnEva Bavati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvA iḍAmupa# hvayEta ya iḍA-̍ mupahUyAtmAna-miḍAyA-mupahvayEtEti̍ sA naḥ̍ priyA supratU̱rtir maGOnItyAhEḍA-mEvOpahUyA&&tmAna̍ -miḍAyAmupa̍# hvayatE vyastamiva̍ vA Etad-yajñasya yadiḍA# sAmi prAś~janti# - [ ] 4

verses.padam: (Padam) sAmi|mArjayantE|Etat|pratIti|vai|asu̍rAṇAm|yajñaḥ|vIti̍|acCidyata|brahma̍ṇA|dEvAḥ|samiti̍|adadhuḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tanutAm|imam|naḥ|iti̍|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|dadhAti|vicCi̍nnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu|iti̍|Aha|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm|iti|Aha|sataMtyEti̍# saM - tatya|Eva|yajñam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|anviti̍|diśati|yAm|vai|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAmi mA̱rjayanta Etat prati vA asurAṇAM̍ ~MyajñO vyacCidyata̍ brahmaṇA̍ dEvAḥ samadadhur̍ bRuhaspati# -stanutAmimaM na ityAha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatir brahmaṇaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM dadhAti̍ vicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtvityA̍ha̍ santatyai̍ viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAmityA̍ha̍ santatyaiva yajñaM dEvEByO&nu# diśati yAM ~Mvai - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñE|dakṣiṇAm|dadA̍ti|tAm|asya|paśava̍ḥ|anu̍|samiti̍|krAmanti|saḥ|Eṣaḥ|IjAnaḥ|apaśuḥ|BAvu̍kaḥ|yaja̍mAnEna|Kalu̍|vai|tat|kArya̱m|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yathA̱|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|dattam|kurvIta|Atmann|paśUn|ramayEta|iti̍|braddhna̍|pinva̍sva|iti̍|Aha|yajñaḥ|vai|braddhnaḥ|yajñam|Eva|tat|mahayati|athO̍ iti|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|Eva|dattam|kurutE|Atmann|paśUn|ramayatE|dadataḥ|mE̍ ( )|mA|kṣAyi|iti|Aha|akṣi̍tim|Eva|upEti̍|Eti|kurvataḥ|mE|mA|upEti̍|dasat|iti̍|Aha|BUmAna̱m|Eva|upEti̍|Eti||6̍ (69) (vidvAn-dhyAyEd-Bavati̍ yaM-prAś^^nanti-yAM ~Mvai-ma-EkAnna viṃśatiśca̍# )(A1)
verses.samhita: yajñE dakṣiṇAM̍ dadAti̍ tAmasya̍ paśavO&nu saM krAmanti̍ sa Eṣa IjAnO̍&paśur̍ BAvukO̍ yajamAnEna̍ Kalu vai tatkArya-mityA̍hur̍ yathA# dEvatrA dattaM kurvItAtman̍ paśUn ramayEtEti braddhna pinvasvEtyAha̍ yajñO vai braddhnO yajñamEva tanmahayatyathO̍# dEvatraiva dattaM kuruta̍ Atman paśUn ramayatE̍ dadatO̍ mE ( ) mA kṣAyItyAhAkṣiti-mEvOpai̍ti̍ kurvatO mE mOpa# dasadityAha̍ BUmAnamEvOpai̍ti||6̍

verses.padam: (Padam) saṅśravA̍ iti saM - śravAḥ|ha|sauvarcanasaḥ|tumi~jjam|aupO̍ditimityaupa̍# - uditim|uvAca|yat|satriṇA̱m|hOtA̱|aBU̱ḥ|kAm|iḍA̱m|upEti|ahvathAḥ|iti̍|tAm|upEti̍|ahvE|iti̍|ha|uvAca|yA|prAṇEnEti̍# pra - anEna|dEvAn|dAdhAra̍|vyAnEnEti̍# vi - anEna|manuṣyAn̍|apAnEnEtya̍pa-anEna̍|pitRUn|iti̍|Cinatti̍|sA|na|CinattI(3)|iti̍|Cinatti̍|iti̍|ha|uvAca|śarI̍ram|vai|asyai|tat|upEti̍|ahvathAḥ|iti̍|ha|uvAca|gauḥ|vai|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saṅśravA̍ ha sauvarcanasaḥ tumi~jjamaupO̍diti-muvAca̍ yathsatriṇAṃq hOtA&BUḥ kAmiḍAmupA̱hvathA iti tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prAṇEna# dEvAn dAdhAra# vyAnEna# manuṣyAnapAnEna̍# pitRuniti# Cinatti sA na CinattI(3)̍ iti# CinattIti# hOvAca śarIraM̍ ~MvA asyai̍ tadupA̱hvathA iti# hOvAca gaurvA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) asyai|śarIram|gAm|vAva|tau|tat|parIti̍|avadatAm|yA|yajñE|dIyatE̱|sA|prAṇEnEti̍# pra - anEna|dEvAn|dAdhAra|yayA̱|manuṣyA̱ḥ|jIva̍nti|sA|vyAnEnEti̍# vi - anEna|manuṣyAn̍|yAm|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|Gnanti|sA|apAnEnEtya̍pa̍ - anEna|pitRUn|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|paśumAniti̍# paśu-mAn|Bavati|atha|vai|tAm|upEti̍|ahvE|iti̍|ha|uvAca|yA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|praBavantIriti̍# pra - BavantIḥ|pratIti̍|ABavatItyA̱̍ - Bavati|iti̍|anna̱m|vai|asyai|tat|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asyai̍ śarIraM̍ gAM ~MvAva tau tat paryavadatAM̍ ~MyA yajñE dIyatE sA prAṇEna# dEvAn dAdhAra̍ yayA# manuṣyA# jIvanti̍ sA vyAnEna# manuṣyAn# yAM pitRuByO Gnanti sA&pAnEna# pitRUn. ya EvaM ~MvEda# paśumAn Bavatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prajAḥ praBavantIḥ̍ pratyABavatItyannaM ~MvA asyai̍ tadu - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) upEti|ahvathAḥ|iti̍|ha|uvAca|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vai|asyAḥ|anna̱m|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|praBavantIriti̍# pra - BavantIḥ|prati̍|Eti̍|Bavanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati|atha|vai|tAm|upEti̍|ahvE|iti̍|ha|uvAca|yA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|parABavantIriti̍# parA - BavantIḥ|anugRuhṇAtItya̍nu̍ - gRuhṇAti|pratIti̍|ABava̍ntIrityA̱̍ - BavantIḥ|gRuhṇAti̍|iti̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|vai|asyai|tat|upEti|ahvathAḥ|iti̍|ha|uvAca|iyam|vai|asyai|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|9 (50)
verses.samhita: pA̱hvathA iti# hOvAcauṣadhayO̍ vA asyA̍ annamOṣadhayO̍ vai prajAḥ praBavantIḥ̍ pratyA Bavanti̍ ya EvaM ~MvEdA̱nnAdO Bavatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prajAḥ parABava̍ntI-ranugRuhṇAti̍ pratyABavantIr̍ gRuhṇAtIti# pratiṣṭhAM ~MvA asyai̍ tadupA̱hvathA iti# hOvAcEyaM ~MvA asyai̍ pratiṣṭhE - [ ] 9

verses.padam: (Padam) iyam|vai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|parABavantIriti̍# parA - BavantIḥ|anviti̍#|gRuhṇAti|pratIti̍|ABava̍ntIrityA̱̍ - BavantIḥ|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|atha̍|vai|tAm|upEti̍|ahvE|iti̍|ha|uvAca|yasyai̱|nikrama̍ṇa̍ iti# ni - kramaṇE|GRutam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|sajIMvantIriti̍# saM - jIvantIḥ|piba̍nti|iti̍|Cinatti̍|sA|na|CinattI(3)|iti̍|na|Cinatti|iti̍|ha|uvAca|prEti̍|tu|janayati|iti̍|Eṣaḥ|vai|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|ahvathAḥ|iti̍# ( )|ha|uvAca|vRuṣṭiḥ|vai|iḍA̱|vRuṣ^^ṭyai̱|vai|nikrama̍ṇa̍ iti# ni - kramaṇE|GRutam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|sajIMvantIriti̍# saM - jIvantIḥ|pibanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati||10 (70) (gaurvA-asyai-tat-pra̍tiṣṭhA-&hva̍thA-iti̍-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: yaM ~Mvai prajAḥ parABava̍ntIranu̍# gRuhṇAti pratyABavantIr̍ gRuhṇAti ya EvaM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yasyai# nikramaṇE̍ GRutaM prajAḥ sa~jja007A;va̍ntIḥ̍ pibantIti# Cinatti sA na CinattI̍ (3) iti na CinattIti̍# hOvAca pra tu janayatItyEṣa̍ vA iḍAmupA̱hvathA iti# ( ) hOvAca vRuṣṭirq.vA iḍA vRuṣṭyai vai nikramaṇE̍ GRutaM prajAḥ sa~jja007A;va̍ntIḥ̍ pibanti ya EvaM ~MvEda praiva jAyatE&nnAdO̍ Bavati||10̍ (gaurvA-asyai̍ tat-pratiṣṭhA-&hva̍thA̍ iti-viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) parOkṣamiti# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|vai|anyE|dEvAḥ|ijyantE̱|pratyakṣamiti# prati - akṣa̱m|anyE|yat|yajatE|yE|Eva|dEvAḥ|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|ijyantE̱|tAn|Eva|tat|yajati|yat|anvAhAryamitya̍nu̍ - AhArya̱m|AharatItyA̱-harati|EtE|vai|dEvAḥ|pratyakṣamiti̍# prati - akṣa̱m|yat|brAhmaṇAḥ|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|athO̍ iti|dakṣi̍ṇA|Eva|asya|EṣA|athO̍ iti|yajñasya̍|Eva|Cidram|apIti̍|dadhAti|yat|vai|yajñasya̍|krUram|yat|vili̍ṣṭamiti̍ vi - liṣṭam|tat|anvAhAryEṇEtya̍nu̍ - AhAryEṇa|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parOkṣaM ~MvA anyE dEvA ijyantE̱ pratyakṣamanyE̍ yad-yajatE̍ ya Eva dEvAḥ parOkṣamijyantE̍ tAnEva tad-yajati̍ yadanvAhArya̍-mAhara̍tyEtE̍ vai dEvAḥ pratyakṣaM ~Myad brA̱hmaṇAstAnEva tEna# prIṇAtyathO dakṣiṇaivAsyaiṣA&thO̍# yajñasyaiva Cidramapi# dadhAti yadvai yajñasya# krUraM ~MyadviliṣṭaM̍ tadanvAhAryE̍ṇA̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) anvAharatItya̍nu̍ - Aharati|tat|anvAhArya̍syEtya̍nu-AhArya̍sya|anvAhAryatvamitya̍nvAhArya̍ - tvam|dEvadUtA iti# dEva - dUtAḥ|vai|EtE|yat|Rutvijaḥ|yat|anvAhArya̍mitya̍nu̍ - AhArya̱m|AharatItyA̱ - harati|dEvadUtAniti̍# dEva - dUtAn|Eva|prIṇAti|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvEByaḥ|yajñAn|vyAdi̍śaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|saḥ|riricAnaḥ|amanyata|saḥ|Etam|anvAhArya̍mitya̍nu̍ - AhArya̱m|aBaktam|apaśyat|tam|Atmann|adhatta|saḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA-patyaḥ|yat|anvAhArya# ityanu̍ - AhAryaḥ|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|anvAhArya̍# ityanu̍ - AhAryaḥ|Ahriyata̍ ityA̱ - hriyatE̱|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|RuddhnOti|aparimita̍ ityapari̍ - mitaḥ|nirupya iti# niḥ-upyaḥ|apa̍rimita̍ ityapari̍ - mitaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|12 (50)
verses.samhita: &nvAharati̍ tadanvAhArya̍syA-nvAhAryatvaM̍ dEvadUtA̍ vA EtE yad-RutvijO yadanvAhArya̍-mAhara̍ti̍ dEvadUtAnEva prIṇAti̍ prajApatir̍ dEvEByO# yajñAn vyAdiśath̍ sa riricAnO̍&manyata̍ sa EtamanvAhArya̍-̍ maBakta-mapaśyat̍ tamAtmannadhattasa̍ vA Eṣa prAjApatyO̍ yadanvAhAryO̍# yasyaivaM ~MviduṣO̱&nvAhArya# AhriyatE# sAkṣAdEva prajApati-mRuddhnOtyapa̍rimitOnirupyO&pa̍rimitaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatE-̍ [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) Aptyai̱|dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|Etam|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|anvAhAryamitya̍nu̍ - AhArya̱m|apaśyann|tam|anvAharantEtya̍nu̍ - Aharanta|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|anvAhArya̍# ityanu̍ - AhAryaḥ|Ahriyata̍ ityA̱ - hriyatE̱|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|yajñEna̍|vai|iṣṭI|pakvEna̍|pUrtI|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|anvAhArya̍# ityanu̍ - AhAryaḥ|Ahriyata̍ ityA̱ - hriyatE̱|saḥ|tu|Eva|iṣṭApUrtItI̱ṣṭa - pUrtI|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|13 (50)
verses.samhita: rAptyai# dEvA vai yad-yajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtaM prAjApatya-ma̍nvAhArya̍-mapaśyan̍ tamanvAharanta̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parAsurA̍ yasyaivaM ~MviduṣO̱&nvAhArya# AhriyatE BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati yajñEna vA iṣṭI pakvEna# pUrtI yasyaivaM ~MviduṣO̱&nvAhArya# AhriyatE sa tvEvEṣṭA̍pUrtI̍ prajApatErBAgO̍&sI-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) iti|Aha|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|Eva|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|Urja̍svAn|paya̍svAn|iti̍|Aha|Urja̱m|Eva|asminn|paya̍ḥ|dadhAti|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa -apAnau|mE|pAhi|samAnavyAnAviti# samAna - vyAnau|mE|pAhi|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|akṣi̍taḥ|asi|akṣi̍tyai|tvA|mA|mE|kṣEṣṭhAḥ|amutra̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|iti̍|Aha|kṣIya̍tE|vai|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|anna̱m|itaḥ̍ pradAnamitItaḥ̍ - pradAnam|hi|amuṣminn|lOkE̍ ( )|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|upajIvantItyupa̍ - jIvanti|yat|Evam|aBimRuśatItya̍Bi̍ - mRuśati|akṣi̍tim|Eva|Enat|gamayati|na|asya|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|anna̱m|kṣIyatE||14̍ (65)
verses.samhita: tyAha̍ prajApatimEva̍ BAgadhEyE̍na̍ samarddhayatyUrja̍svAn̍ payasvAnityAhOrja̍-mEvAsmin̍ payO# dadhAti prAṇApAnau mE# pAhi samAnavyAnau mE# pAhItyAhA&&śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śAstE &kṣitO̍ &syakṣityai̍ tvA mA mE̱ kṣEṣṭhA amutrAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOka ityAha̍ kṣIyatE̍ vA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE&nna-̍ mitaḥpradAnaṅq̍ hyamuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE ( ) prajA upajIva̍nti̍ yadEva-maBimRuśatyakṣi̍ti-mEvaina̍d̍ gamayati nAsyAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE&nnaM̍ kṣIyatE||14

verses.padam: (Padam) barqḥiṣaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|prajAvAniti# prajA -vAn|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|baraḥiṣA̱|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|tEna|Eva|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|sRujatE|narAśaṃsasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|paśumAniti# paśu-mAn|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|narAśaṃsE̍na|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paśUn|asRujata|tEna|Eva|paśUn|sRujatE|agnEḥ|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|AyuṣmAn|yajñEna̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati-sthAm|gamEyam|iti|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|pratIti̍|yajñEna̍|tiṣṭhati|dara.śapUrṇamAsayOriti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsayO̱ḥ|15 (50)
verses.samhita: barqḥiṣO&haM dEvayajyayA̱̍ prajAvA̱n BUyAsamityAha̍ barqḥiṣA vai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tEnaiva prajAḥ sRujatE̍ narAśaṃsasyAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśumAn BUyAsamityA̍ha̍ narAśaṃsEna̍ vai prajApatiḥ̍ paśUnasRujata̍ tEnaiva paśUnth sRujatE&gnEḥ̍ sviṣṭakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA&&yu̍ṣmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyamityAhA&&yu̍rEvAtman̍ dhattE̍ prati# yajñEna# tiṣṭhati daṛśapUrṇamAsayOr - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|dEvAḥ|ujjitimityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|ajayann|darq.śapUrṇamAsAByAmiti̍# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsAByA̱m|asurAn|apEti̍|anudanta|agnEḥ|aham|ujji̍timityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|iti̍|Aha|darq.śapUrṇamAsayOriti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsayO̱ḥ|Eva|dEvatAnAm|yaja̍mAnaḥ|ujji̍timityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jayati|dara.śapUrṇamAsAByAmiti̍# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsAByA̱m|BrAtRuvyAn|apEti̍|nudatE|vAja̍vatIByAmiti̍ vAja# - vatIByAm|vIti|Uhati|anna̱m|vai|vAja̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yaḥ|vai|yajñasya|dvau|dOhau̱|vidvAn|yaja̍tE|uBayata̍ḥ|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai dEvA ujjiti-manUda̍jayan̍ daṛśapUrṇamAsAByA- masurAnapA̍-nudantAgnE-rahamujji̍ti-manUjjE̍ṣa-̍ mityAha̍ daṛśapUrṇamAsayOrEva̍ dEvatAnAM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ ujjitimanUjja̍yati̍ daṛśapUrṇamAsAByAM BrAtRuvyAnapa̍# nudatE vAjavatIByAM̍ ~MvyUhatyannaM̍ ~Mvai vAjO&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ yO vai yajñasya dvau dOhau# vidvAn yajata̍ uBayata# - [ ] 16

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|yajñam|duhE|purastA̱t|ca|upariṣṭAt|ca|Eṣaḥ|vai|anyaḥ|yajñasya̍|dOha̍ḥ|iḍA̍yAm|anyaḥ|yaṛhi̍|hOtA̱|yaja̍mAnasya|nAma̍|gRuhṇIyAt|taṛhi̍|brUyAt|Eti̍|imAḥ|agmann|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|dOha̍kAmA̍ iti dOha# - kAmAḥ|iti|saṅstu̍tA̍ iti saM - stutAḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|duhE|athO iti|uBayataḥ̍|Eva|yajñam|duhE|purastA̱t|ca|upari̍ṣṭhat|ca|rOhi̍tEna|tvA|agniḥ|dEvatA̱m|gamayatu|iti̍|Aha|EtE|vai|dEvAśvA̍ iti# dEva - aśvAḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: Eva yajñaM duhE̍ purastA̱ccOpariṣṭAccaiṣa̍ vA anyO yajñasya dOha iḍAyAmanyO̍ yaṛhi hOtA yajamAnasya̍ nAma# gRuhṇIyAt taṛhi# brUyAdEmA agmannAśiṣO̍ dOhakAmA̍ iti saṅstutA̍ Eva dEvatA# duhE&thO# uBayata# Eva yajñaM duhE̍ purastA̱ccOpariṣṭAcca̍ rOhitEna̍ tvA&gnirdEvatA̱M gamayatvityAhaitE̍ vai dEvAśvA̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) yajamAnaḥ|prastara̍ iti# pra - staraḥ|yat|Etaiḥ|prastaramiti# pra - staram|praharatIti# pra - harati|dEvAśvairiti̍# dEva - aśvaiḥ|Eva|yajamAnam|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|vIti|tE|mu~jcAmi|raśanAḥ|vIti̍|raśmIn|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|vimOka̍ iti# vi - mOkaḥ|tEna|Eva|Enam|vIti̍|mu~jcati|viṣṇO̱ḥ|śaM~MyOriti̍# śaM - yOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱|yajñEna|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamEyam|iti|Aha|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñE|Eva|antataḥ|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|sOma̍sya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|surEtA iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ|18 (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnaḥ̍ prastarO yadEtaiḥ prastaraM̍ praharati̍ dEvAśvairEva yajamAnaṃ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ vi tE# mu~jcAmi raśanA vi raśmInityAhaiṣa̍ vA agnErvimOkastE-naivainaM̍ ~Mvimu~jcati̍ qviṣṇO̱ḥ śaM~MyOrahaM dEvayajyayA̍# yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyamityA̍ha̍ yajñO vai viṣṇur̍ yajña EvAntataḥ prati# tiṣṭhati sOmasyAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# surEtA -[ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) rEtaḥ|dhiṣIya|iti̍|Aha|sOma̍ḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ-dhAḥ|tEna|Eva|rEta̍ḥ|Atmann|dhattE|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|paśUnAm|rUpam|puṣEyam|iti|Aha|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|paśUnAm|mithunAnA̱m|rUpakRuditi̍# rUpa - kRut|tEna|Eva|paśUnAm|rUpam|Atmann|dhattE|dEvAnA̱m|patnI̱ḥ|agniḥ|gRuhapa̍tiriti̍# gRuha - patiḥ|yajñasya|mithunam|tayO̱ḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|mithunEna|prEti̍|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|EtasmA̱t|vai|mithunAt|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|mithunEna|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rEtO# dhiṣIyEtyAha̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhAstEnaiva̍ rEta# Atman dhattE̍ tvaṣṭurahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśUnAṃ rUpaM puṣEyamityA̍ha̍ tvaṣṭA vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRuttEnaiva paśUnAṃ̍ rUpamAtman dhattE̍ dEvAnAM patnIragnir̍ gRuhapatir̍ yajñasya# mithunaM tayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# mithunEna praBUyAsa-mityA̍haitasmAd̍ vai mithunAt̍ prajApatir̍ mithunEna - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|ajAyata|tasmA̱t|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|mithunEna̍|prEti̍|jAyatE|vEdaḥ|asi|vitti̍ḥ|asi|vidEya̍|iti̍|Aha|vEdEna̍|vai|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|vittam|vEdya̱m|avindanta|tat|vEdasya̍|vEdatvamiti̍# vEda - tvam|yadyaditi yat - yat|BrAtRuvyasya|aBiddhyAyEditya̍Bi-dhyAyE̱t|tasya̍|nAma̍|gRuhṇIyAt|tat|Eva|asya|sarva̱m|vRu~gktE|GRutava̍ntamiti̍# GRuta - vantam|kulAyina̱m|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|sahasriṇa̱m|vEdaḥ|dadAtu|vAjina̱m|iti|Aha|prEti̍|sahasra̱m|paśUn|ApnOti̍ ( )|Eti|asya|prajAyAmiti̍# pra - jAyA̱m|vAjI|jAyatE|yaḥ|Evam|vEda||20̍ (58)
verses.samhita: prAjAyata̍ tasmAdEva̍ yajamAnO̍ mithunEna prajAyatE̍ vEdO&si̍ vittirasi̍ vidEyEtyAha̍ vEdEna vai dEvA asurAṇAM̍ ~MvittaM ~MvEdyamavindanta̍ tad-vEdasya# vEdatvaM ~Myadyad BrAtRuvyasyABiddhyAyEt̍ tasya nAma# gRuhṇIyAt tadEvAsya sarvaM̍ ~MvRu~gktE GRutavantaM̍ kulAyinaṃ# rAyaspOṣaṃ# sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvEdO dadAtu̍ vAjinamityAha̍ prasahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOtyA ( ) sya# prajAyA̱M ~MvAjI jAyatE̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda||20̍

verses.padam: (Padam) dhruvAm|vai|ricyamAnAm|yajñaḥ|anviti̍|ricyatE|yajñam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|dhruvAm|ApyAyamAnAmityA̱̍ - pyAyamAnAm|yajñaḥ|anu̍|Eti̍|pyAyatE|yajñam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eti|pyAyatAm|dhruvA|GRutEna̍|iti̍|Aha|dhruvAm|Eva|Eti̍|pyAyayati|tAm|ApyAya̍mAnAmityA̱̍ - pyAyamAnAm|yajñaḥ|anu̍|Eti̍|pyAyatE|yajñam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|viBAniti# vi - BAn|nAma|lOkaḥ|tasminn̍|tvA|dadhAmi|saha|yaja̍mAnEna|iti̍|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvAM ~Mvai ricyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nu# ricyatE yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajA dhruvAmApyAyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nvA pyAyatE̍ yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajA A pyAyatAM̍ dhruvA GRutEnEtyAha̍ dhruvAmEvA && pyAyayati̍ tAmApyAyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nvA pyAyatE̍ yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajAḥ prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmiṅstvA̍ dadhAmi saha yajamAnEnEtyA̍# - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) Aha|ayam|vai|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|viBAniti# vi - BAn|nAma|lOkaḥ|tasminn̍|Eva|Enam|dadhAti|saha|yaja̍mAnEna|ricya̍tE|iva|vai|Etat|yat|yaja̍tE|yat|yajamAnaBAgamiti̍# yajamAna - BAgam|prAśnAtIti# pra - aśnAti|AtmAna̱m|Eva|prIṇAti|EtAvAn̍|vai|yajñaḥ|yAvAn̍|yajamAnaBAga̍ iti# yajamAna - BAgaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajamAnaḥ|yat|yajamAnaBAgamiti̍# yajamAna - BAgam|prAśnAtIti# pra - aśnAti|yajñE|Eva|yajñam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|Etat|vai|sUyava̍samiti̍# su - yavasam|sOda̍kamiti̍ sa - udakam|yat|barqḥiḥ|ca|Apaḥ|ca|Etat|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hAyaM ~Mvai prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmi-nnEvaina̍M̍ dadhAti saha yajamAnEna̍ ricyata̍ iva vA Etad-yad-yajatE̍ yad-yajamAnaBAgaM̍ prAś~jAtyAtmAnamEva̍ prIṇAtyEtAvAnq.̍ vai yajñO yAvAn.̍ yajamAnaBAgO yajñO yajamAnO̍ yad-yajamAnaBAgaM̍ prAś~jAti# yajña Eva yajñaM prati# ṣṭhApayatyEtadvai sUyavasaṃq̍ sOdakaM̍ yadbarqḥiścA&&paścaitad̍ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) yajamAnasya|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|yat|vEdi̍ḥ|yat|pUrṇapAtramiti̍# pUrṇa - pAtram|antarvEdItyantaḥ̍ - vEdi|ninayatIti# ni - nayati|svE|Eva|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|sUyava̍samiti̍# su - yavasam|sOda̍kamiti̍ sa - udakam|kurutE|sat|asi|sat|mE|BUyAḥ|iti|Aha|Apa̍ḥ|vai|yajñaḥ|Apa̍ḥ|amRuta̱m|yajñam|Eva|amRuta̱m|Atmann|dhattE|sarvA̍ṇi|vai|BUtAni̍|vratam|upayantamityu̍pa̍ - yanta̱m|anu|upEti̍|yanti|prAcyA̱m|diśi|dEvAḥ|Rutvija̍ḥ|mArjayantAm|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|darq.śapUrṇamAsayOriti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsayO̱ḥ|avaBRutha ityava̍ - BRuthaḥ|23 (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnasyA&&yata̍naM̍ ~MyadvEdiryat pU̱rṇapAtra-mantarvEdi̍ ninayati̍ sva EvA&&yatanE̍ sUyavasaṃq̍ sOdakaM̍ kurutE sadasi̍ sanmE# BUyA ityAhA&&pO vai yajña ApO&mRutaM̍ ~MyajñamEvAmRuta-mAtman̍ dhattE̍ sarvAṇi̍ vai BUtAni# vrata-mupayanta̍ -manUpa# yanti prAcyA̱M diśi dEvA RutvijO# mArjayantA-mityAhaiṣa̍ vai daṛśapUrṇamAsayO̍-ravaBRuthO̍ -[ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) yAni|Eva|Enam|BUtAni̍|vratam|upayantamityu̍pa̍ - yanta̱m|anUpayantItyanu̍ - upayanti|taiḥ|Eva|saha|avaBRuthamitya̍va̍ - BRutham|avEti|Eti|viṣṇu̍muKA̍ iti viṣṇu# - muKAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|imAn|lOkAn|anapajayyamityanapa-jayyam|aBIti̍|ajayann|yat|viṣṇukramAniti̍# viṣṇu - kramAn|kramatE|viṣṇu̍ḥ|Eva|BUtvA|yaja̍mAnaḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|imAn|lOkAn|anapajayyamityanapa̍ - jayyam|aBIti|jayati|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krama̍ḥ|asi|aBimAtihEtya̍BimAti̍ - hA|iti|Aha|gAyatrI|vai|pRuthivI|traiṣṭu̍Bam|antari̍kṣam|jAga̍tI|dyauḥ|Anu̍ṣṭuBIrityAnu̍# - sthuBIḥ|diśaḥ̍ ( )|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|imAn|lOkAn|yathApUrvamiti# yathA - pUrvam|aBIti|jayati||24̍ (57)
verses.samhita: yAnyEvainaM̍ BUtAni# vratamupayanta̍-manUpayanti̍ tairEva sahAvaBRuthamavai̍ti̍ viṣṇumuKA̍ vai dEvA śCandOBirimAn̍ ~MlOkA-nanapajayyamaBya̍jayanq.̍ yad-viṣṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ viṣṇurEva̍ BUtvA yajamAnaśCandO̍BirimAn̍ ~MlOkA-nanapajayyamaBi̍ jayati̍ viṣṇOḥ kramO̱&syaBimAtihEtyAha̍ gAyatrI vai pRuthivI̍ traiṣṭuBamantari̍kṣaM̍ jAgatI̍ dyaurAnuṣṭuBIr̍ diśa śCandOBirEvEmAn̍ ~MlOkAn. yathApUrvamaBi̍ jayati||24̍

verses.padam: (Padam) aganma|suva̍ḥ|suva̍ḥ|aganma|iti̍|Aha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|Eti|sadRuMśa iti# saM -dRuśaḥ|tE|mA|Cithsi|yat|tE|tapa̍ḥ|tasmai̱|tE|mA|Eti̍|vRukṣi|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|suBUriti# su- BUḥ|asi|śrEṣṭhaḥ|raśmInAm|Ayud^^rdhA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dhAḥ|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|dhEhi|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|prEti̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|asmAt|lOkAt|cyavatE|yaḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aganma̍ suvaḥ suvaraganmEtyA̍ha̍ suvargamEva lOkamEti̍ sandRuśastE̍ mA Cithsi̍ yattE tapastasmai# tE mA && vRukṣItyAha̍ yathAyaju-rEvaitath suBUrasi̍ śrEṣṭhO# raśmInAmAyurddhA̍ asyAyurmE̍ dhEhItyAhA&&śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE pra vA EṣO̱&smAn ~MlOkAccyavatE̍ yO - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) viṣṇukramAniti# viṣṇu - kramAn|kramatE|suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ-gAya|hi|lOkAya̍|viṣṇukramA̍ iti# viṣṇu - kramAḥ|kramyantE̱|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|viṣṇukramAniti̍# viṣṇu - kramAn|kramEta|yaḥ|imAn|lOkAn|BrAtRuvyasya|sam~MvidyEti̍# saM - vidya|puna̍ḥ|imam|lOkam|pratyavarOhEditi̍# prati - avarOhE̱t|iti|Eṣaḥ|vai|asya|lOkasya̍|pratyavarOha̍ iti# prati - avarOhaḥ|yat|Aha|idam|aham|amum|BrAtRu̍vyam|AByaḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|asyai|divaḥ|iti|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|BrAtRu̍vyasya|sam~MvidyEti̍# saM - vidya|puna̍ḥ|imam|lOkam|pratyava̍rOhatIti̍# prati - avarOhati|samiti̍|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: viṣṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ suvargAya hi lOkAya# viṣṇukramAḥ kramyantE̱ brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvai viṣṇukramAn̍ kramEta̍ ya imAn ~MlOkAn BrAtRuvyasya̍ saM~Mvidya punarimaM̍ ~MlOkaM pratyavarOhEdityEṣa̍ vA asya lOkasya# pratyavarOhO yadAhEdamahamamuM BrAtRuvyamAByO̍ digByO̱&syai diva itImAnEva lOkAn BrAtRuvyasya̍ saM~Mvidya punarimaM̍ ~MlOkaM pratyavarOhati̍ saM - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) jyOtiṣA|aBUvam|iti̍|Aha|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|aindrIm|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anvAvarta̍ ityanu̍ - AvartE|iti̍|Aha|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|indra̍ḥ|tasya̍|Eva|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anviti|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|dakṣiṇA|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|svam|Eva|vIrya̱m|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|tasmA̱t|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|ad^^rdha̍ḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|vIryA̍vattara̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - taraḥ|athO iti|Adityasya̍|Eva|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anviti|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|samiti̍|aham|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|samiti|mayA̱|prajEti̍# pra - jA|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|27 (50)
verses.samhita: jyOtiṣA&BUvamityA̍hAsminnEva̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyaindrI-mAvRuta-manvAva̍rta̍ ityAhAsau̍ vA Aditya̍ indrastasyaivA&&vRutamanu# paryAvartatE̍ dakṣiṇA paryAvartatE̍ svamEva vIryamanu̍# paryAvartatE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇO&rddha# AtmanO# vIryAvattarO&thO̍# AdityasyaivA&&vRutamanu# paryAvartatE̍ samahaM prajayA saM mayA̱ prajEtyAhA&&śiṣa̍# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|sami̍ddha̍ iti saM - iddhaḥ|agnE|mE|dIdihi|samEddhEti# saM - EddhA|tE|agnE|dIdyAsam|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|vasumAniti̍ vasu# - mAn|yajñaḥ|vasIyAn|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|bahu|vai|gAṛha̍patyasyEti̍ gAṛha# - patyasya|antE̱|miśram|iva|caryatE|AgnipAvamAnIByAmityA̱gni - pAvamAnIByA̱m|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|punAti̍|Eva|agnim|punItE|AtmAna̱m|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|agnE̱|gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE|iti|Aha|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mEvaitAmA śA̱stE samiddhO̍ agnE mE dIdihi samEddhA tE# agnE dIdyAsamityAha̍ yathAyaju-rEvaitadvasumAn.̍ yajñO vasIyAn̍ BUyAsa-mityAhA-&&śiṣa̍mEvEtAmA̍ śA̱stE bahu vai gAṛhapatyasyAntE̍# miśramiva̍ caryata AgnipAvamAnIByAM gAṛhapatyamupa̍# tiṣṭhatE punAtyEvAgniM punIta̍ AtmAnaM dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityA̍ agnE# gRuhapata ityAha̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: (Padam) yathAyajuriti# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|śatam|himA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|śatam|tvA|hEmantAn|indhiṣIya|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|putrasya̍|nAma̍|gRuhṇAti|annAdamitya̍nna̍ - adam|Eva|Enam|karOti|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|iti̍|brUyAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|ajA̍taḥ|syAt|tEjasvI|Eva|asya|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|putraḥ|jAyatE|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|iti̍|brUyAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yathAyajurEvaitacCataṃ himA ityAha̍ śataM tvA# hEmantAnindhiṣIyEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ putrasya nAma# gRuhṇAtyannAdamEvainaM̍ karOti tAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAd-yasya# putrO&jAtaḥ̍ syAt tEjasvyE̍vAsya̍# brahmavarcasI putrO jAyatE̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE&muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAd-yasya# putrO - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) jAtaḥ|syAt|tEjaḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|yaḥ|vai|yajñam|prayujyEti# pra-yujya|na|vimu~jcatIti̍# vi - mu~jcati|apratiṣṭhAna̍ ityaprati̍ - sthAnaḥ|vai|saḥ|Bavati|kaḥ|tvA|yunakti|saḥ|tvA|vIti|mu~jcatu|iti̍|Aha|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|kaḥ|prajApatinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|Enam|yunakti|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|vIti|mu~jcati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|Iśvaram|vai|vratam|avisRuṣṭamityavi̍# - sRuṣṭam|pradaha iti# pra - dahaḥ|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|vratam|acAriṣam|iti|Aha|vratam|Eva|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jAtaḥ syAttEja# EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ yO vai yajñaM prayujya na vimu~jcatya̍pratiṣṭhAnO̍ vai sa Bavati̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvA vi mu~jcatvityA̍ha̍ prajApatir̍ vai kaḥ prajApatinaivaina̍M̍ ~Myunakti# prajApatinA̍ vi mu~jcati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ IśvaraM ~Mvai vratamavisRuṣṭaM̍ pradahO&gnE̱ vratapatE vratamacAriṣamityA̍ha̍ vratamEva-[ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) vIti|sRujatE|śAntyai̱|apra̍dAhAyEtyapra̍# - dAhAya|parA~g|vAva|yajñaḥ|Eti|na|nIti̍|vartatE|puna̍ḥ|yaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|punarAlaBaMmiti̍# punaḥ - AlaBaMm|vidvAn|yajatE|tam|aBi|nIti̍|vartatE|yajñaḥ|baBUva|saḥ|Eti̍|baBUva|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|punarAlaBaM̍ iti# punaḥ-AlaBaMḥ|tEna|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|laBatE|ana̍varuddhEtyana̍va̍ - ruddhA|vai|Etasya|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|yaḥ|AhitAgnirityAhi̍ta-agniḥ|sann|asaBaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai̍ ( )|brAhmaṇasya|saBA|iṣṭvA|prA~g|utkramyEtyu̍t̍ - kramya|brUyAt|gOmAniti̍ gO - mAn|agnE|avimAnityavi̍# - mAn|aśvI|yajñaḥ|iti|avEti̍|saBAm|rundhE|prEti̍|sahasra̱m|paśUn|ApnOti|Eti̍|asya|prajAyAmiti̍# pra - jAyA̱m|vAjI|jAyatE||31 (74) (yaḥ-sa-mAsiṣaM-gRuhapata-ityA̍hA-&muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAd-yasya# putrO-vratamEva-Kalu-vai-caturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: vi sRujatE̍ śAntyA apradAhAya̍ parA~ga. vAva yajña Eti̍ na ni vartatE̍ punaryO vai yajñasya# punarAlaMBaM ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ tamaBi ni vartatE̍ yajñO baBUva̍ sa A baBUvEtyA̍haiṣa̍ vai yajñasya# punarAlaMBa-stEnaivainaM punarA laBatE&na̍varuddhA̍ vA Etasya# virAḍ ya AhitAgniḥ̍ sannasaBaḥ̍ paśavaḥ Kalu vai ( ) brA̱hmaṇasya# saBEṣṭvA prA~gutkramya# brUyAd gOmAṃ# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajña ityava# saBAṃ rundhE pra sahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOtyA&sya# prajAyA̱M ~MvAjI jAyatE||31̍ (yaḥ-sa-mAsiṣaM-gRuhapata-ityA̍hA-muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAd yasyaputrO-vratamEva-Kalu̍ vai- caturviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) dEva|savitaḥ|prEti̍|suva|yajñam|prEti̍|suva|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|BagAya|divyaḥ|gandharvaḥ||kEtapUriti̍# kEta - pUḥ|kEta̱m|naḥ|punAtu|vAcaḥ|patiḥ|vAca̱m|adya|svadAti|naḥ||indra̍sya|vajra̍ḥ|asi|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra# - Gnaḥ|tvayA̱|ayam|vRutram|vaddhyAt||vAjasya|nu|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|mAtara̱m|mahIm|aditim|nAma̍|vaca̍sA|karAmahE||yasyA̱m|idam|viśva̱m|Buva̍nam|AvivEśEtyA̱̍ - vivEśa|tasyA̱m|naḥ|dEvaḥ|savitA|dharma̍|sAviṣat||aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|32 (50)
verses.samhita: dEva# savitaḥ pra suva̍ yajñaM pra suva̍ yajñapatiM̍ BagAya̍ divyO gandharvaḥ|kEtapUḥ̍ kEtaM̍ naḥ punAtu vAcaspatir vAcamadya̍ svadAti̍ naḥ||indrasya̍ vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastvayA&yaM̍ ~MvRutraM ~MvaddhyAt||vAja̍sya̍ nu prasavE̍ mAtaraM̍ mahImaditiM̍ nAma vacasA̍ karAmahE|yasyAmidaM̍ ~MviśvaM Buvana-mAvivEśa̍ tasyA̱M nO dEvaḥ savitA̍ dharma# sAviṣat||aPsva-[̍ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) antaḥ|amRuta̱m|aPsvityap̍ - su|BEṣajam|apAm|uta|praśastiṣviti̍ pra - śastiṣu|aśvA̱ḥ|Bavatha|vAjinaḥ||vAyuḥ|vA|tvA|manuḥ|vA|tvA|gandharvAḥ|saptaviṃ̍śatiriti̍# sapta - viṃqśatiḥ||tE|agrE̱|aśva̱m|Ayu~jjann|tE|asminn|javam|Eti|adadhuḥ||apA̱m|napAt|AśuhEmannityA̍śu̍ - hEman|yaḥ|Urmiḥ|kakudmAniti# kakut - mAn|pratU̱rtiriti pra - tUrtiḥ|vAjasAtama̍ iti# vAja - sAtamaḥ|tEna̍|ayam|vAja̱m|sEt||viṣṇO̱ḥ|krama̍ḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|krAntam|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|vikrA̱ntamiti̍ vi - krAntam|asi|a~gkau|nya~gkAviti# ni - a~gkau ( )|aBitaḥ|ratha̱m|yau|dhvAntam|vAtAgramiti̍# vAta - agram|anviti|sacaMra̍ntAviti̍# saM - carantau|dUrEhE̍tiriti̍# dUrE - hEtiḥ|indriyAvAnitI̱ndriya - vAn|patatrI|tE|naḥ|agnayaḥ|papra̍yaḥ|pArayantu||33̍ (65)
verses.samhita: ntaramRutamaPsu̍ BEṣajamapAmuta̍ praśastiṣvaśvA̍# Bavatha vAjinaḥ||vAyur vA̱ tvA manur̍ vA tvA gandharvAḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ|tE̍ agrE aśvamAyu~jjantE̍ asmi~jjavamA&da̍dhuḥ||apA̱M̍ napAdAśuhEmanq. ya Urmiḥ kakudmAn pratU̱rtir vAjasAtamastEnAyaM̍ ~MvAjaṃ# sEt||viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ krAntamasi̍ viṣṇOr vikrA̱ntamasya~gkau nya~gkA ( ) vaBitO rathaM ~Myau dhvAntaM ~MvAtAgramanu̍# sa~jcarantau̍ dUrEhEti-rindriyAvA̱n̍ patatrI tE nO&gnayaḥ paprayaḥ̍ pArayantu||33

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvasya|aham|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|bRuhaspatinA|vAjajitEti̍# vAja - jitA̱|vAja̱m|jEṣam|dEvasya|aham|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|bRuhaspatinA|vAjajitEti̍# vAja - jitA̱|vaṛṣiṣṭham|nAka̱m|ruhEyam|indrA̍ya|vAca̱m|vadata|indra̱m|vAja̱m|jApayata|indra̍ḥ|vAja̱m|ajayit||aśvA̍janItyaśva̍# - ajani|vAjini|vAjEṣu|vAjinIvatIti̍# vAjinI - vati|aśvAn|samathsviti̍# samat-sa|vAjaya||arvA̱|asi|saptiḥ|asi|vAjI|asi|vAji̍naḥ|vAja̱m|dhAvata|marutA̱m|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|jayata|vIti|yOja̍nA|mimIddhvam|addhva̍naḥ|skaBnIta|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasyAhaṃ savituḥ̍ prasavE̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ vAjajitA vAjaM̍ jEṣaM dEvasyAhaṃ savituḥ̍ prasavE̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ vAjajitA vaṛṣiṣṭhaM̍ nAkaṃ# ruhEyamindrAya̍ vAcaM̍ ~MvadatEndraM vAjaM̍ jApayatEndrO vAjamajayit||aśvA̍jani̍ vAjini vAjEṣu̍ vAjinIvatyaśvA̱nth samathsu# vAjaya||arvA&si̍ saptirasi̍ vAjyasi̍ vAjinO̍ vAjaM̍ dhAvata marutA̱M prasavE jayata̍ vi yOjanA̍ mimIddhvamaddhvanaḥ̍ skaBnIta-[ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) kAṣṭhA̱m|gacCata|vAjEvAja̍ iti vAjE̱- vAjE|avata|vAjinaḥ|naḥ|dhanEṣu|viprAḥ|amRutAḥ|RutajñA̍ ityRuta̍ - jñAḥ||asya|maddhvaḥ|pibata|mAdaya̍ddhvam|tRuptAḥ|yAta|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|dEvayAnariti# dEva - yAnai̱ḥ||tE|naḥ|arvantaḥ|havanaśruta̍ iti# havana - śrutaḥ|hava̱m|viśvE̱|śRuṇvantu|vAjina̍ḥ||mitadra̍va̍ iti# mita - dravaḥ|sahasrasA iti# sahasra-sAḥ|mEdhasAtEti# mEdha-sAtA|saniṣyavaḥ||mahaḥ|yE|ratna̱m|samithEṣviti̍# saM - ithEṣu|jaBrirE|śam|naḥ|Bavantu|vAjina̍ḥ|havE̍ṣu||dEvatAtEti̍# dEva - tAtA|mitadrava̍ iti# mita - dravaḥ|svarkA iti# sU - arkAḥ||jaBaMyantaḥ|ahi̱m|vRuka̱m|rakṣAṃ̍si|sanE̍mi|asmat|yuyavann|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kAṣṭhA̱M gacCata vAjEvAjE&vata̍ vAjinO nO dhanEṣu̍ viprA amRutA RutajñAḥ||asya maddhvaḥ̍ pibata mAdayaddhvaM̍ tRuptA yAta̍ pathiBir̍ dEvayAnai̱ḥ||tE nO arvantO̍ havanaśrutO havaM ~MviśvE# śRuṇvantu vAjinaḥ||mitadra̍vaḥ̍ sahasrasA mEdhasAtA̍ saniṣyavaḥ|mahO̍ yE ratnaṃ# samithEṣu# jaBrirE śannO# Bavantu vAjinO havEṣu||dEvatA̍tA̍ mitadravaḥ̍ svarkAḥ|jaMBayantO&hiM ~MvRukaṃq rakṣAṃsi̍ sanE̱myasmadyuyava̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) amIvAḥ||Eṣaḥ|syaḥ|vAjI|kṣipaṇim|turaṇyati|grIvAyA̱m|baddhaḥ|apikakṣa̍ ityapi̍ - kakṣE|Asani||kratu̱m|dadhikrA̍ iti# dadhi - krAḥ|anviti|santavI̱tvaditi̍# saM - tavI̱tvat|pathAm|a~gkAṃsi|anviti̍|ApanI̍PaṇadityA̱̍ - panIPaṇat||uta|sma|asya|drava̍taḥ|turaṇyataḥ|parṇam|na|vEḥ|anviti̍|vAti|pragad^^rdhina̍ iti# pra - gad^^rdhinaḥ||śyEnasya̍|iva|dhraja̍taḥ|a~gkasam|parIti̍|dadhikrAv.ṇṇa̍ iti# dadhi-krAv.ṇṇaḥ|saha|UrjA|tari̍trataḥ||Eti̍|mA|vAja̍sya|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|jagamyAt|Eti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|viśvaśaBUMq̍ iti# viśva - śaBUMq||Eti|mA|gantAm|pitarA̱|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nnamIvAḥ||Eṣa̍ sya vAjI kṣipaṇiM̍ turaṇyati̍ grIvAyA̱M baddhO apikakṣa̍ Asani|kratu̍M̍ dadhikrA anu# santavI̱tvat pathAma~gkAṅqsyanvApanIPaṇat||uta̍ smA̱sya dravata-sturaṇyataḥ̍ parṇaM na vE-ranu# vAti pragarddhinaḥ|śyEnasyE̍va̍ dhrajatO̍ a~gkasaM pari# dadhikrAv.ṇṇaḥ̍ sahOrjA taritrataḥ||A̍ mA vAjasya̍ prasavO jagamyAdA̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ viśvaśaMBU|A̍ mA# gantAM pitarA# - [ ] 36

verses.padam: (Padam) mAtarA̱|ca|Eti|mA|sOma̍ḥ|amRutatvAyEtya̍mRuta̍ - tvAya|gamyAt||vAji̍naḥ|vAjajita̍ iti# vAja - jitaḥ|vAja̱m|sariṣyantaḥ|vAja̱m|jEṣyanta̍ḥ|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|BAgam|avEti̍|jiGrata|vAji̍naḥ|vAjajita̍ iti# vAja - jitaḥ|vAja̱m|sasRuvAṃsaḥ|vAja̱m|jigivAṃsa̍ḥ|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|BAgE|nIti̍|mRuḍhvam|iyam|vaḥ|sA|satyA|sadhEMti̍# saM - dhA|aBUt|yAm|indrEṇa|samadha̍ddhvamiti̍# saM - adhaddhvam|ajI̍jipata|vanaspatayaḥ|indra̱m|vAja̱m|vIti̍|mucyaddhvam||37̍ (42) (skaBnIta-yuyavan-pitarA-dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: mAtarA cA&& mA sOmO# amRutatvAya# gamyAt||vAjinO̍ vAjajitO vAjaṃ# sariṣyantO vAjaM̍ jEṣyantO bRuhaspatE̱r BAgamava# jiGrata vAjinO̍ vAjajitO vAjaṃ# sasRuvAṃsO vAjaM̍ jigivAṃsO bRuhaspatE̱r BAgE ni mRuḍhvamiyaM̍ ~Mvaḥ sA satyA sandhA&BUdyAmindrEṇa̍ samadhaddhva-majI̍jipata̍ vanaspataya indraM ~MvAjaM ~Mvi mucyaddhvaM||37̍ (skaBnIta-yuyavan-pitarA-dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) kṣatrasya|ulba̱m|asi|kṣatrasya̍|yOni̍ḥ|asi|jAyE̱|Eti̍|ihi|suva̍ḥ|rOhA̍va|rOhA̍va|hi|suva̍ḥ|aham|nau|uBayO̱ḥ|suva̍ḥ|rOkṣyAmi|vAja̍ḥ|ca|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|ca|apija ityapi-̍ jaḥ|ca|kratuḥ|ca|suva̍ḥ|ca|mUd^^rdhA|ca|vyaśni̍ya̍ iti# vi - aśniyaḥ|ca|AntyAyanaḥ|ca|antya̍ḥ|ca|Bauvanaḥ|ca|Buva̍naḥ|ca|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|ca||Ayuḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|yajñEna|kalpatAm|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|38 (50)
verses.samhita: kṣatrasyOlaṅmasi̍ kṣatrasya yOnirasi̍ jAya Ehi suvO rOhAva̍ rOhAva̍ hi suvarahaM̍ nAvuBayOḥ̍ suvO# rOkṣyAmi vAjaśca̍ prasavaścApijaśca̍ kratuśca̍ suvaśca̍ mUrddhA ca vyaś~jniyaścA&&ntyAyana̍ ścAntyaśca̍ Bauvanaśca BuvanaścAdhi̍patiśca|Ayu̍r̍ yajñEna# kalpatAM prAṇO yajñEna# kalpatAmapAnO - [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñEna|kalpatAm|vyAna̍ iti# vi - anaḥ|yajñEna|kalpatAm|cakṣu̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|śrOtra̱m|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|mana̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|vAk|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|AtmA|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|yajñaḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|suva̍ḥ|dEvAn|aganma|amRutA̱|aBUma|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|aBUma|samiti|aham|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|samiti|mayA̱|prajEti̍# pra-jA|samiti|aham|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|mayA̱|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̍ḥ|annA̍ya|tvA|annAdyAyEtya̍nna̍ - adyAya|tvA|vAjA̍ya̍ ( )|tvA|vAjajityAyA iti# vAja - jityAyai̱|tvA|amRuta̱m|asi|puṣṭiḥ|asi|prajana̍namiti̍# pra - jananam|asi||39̍ (59)
verses.samhita: yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MvyAnO yajñEna# kalpatAM cakṣur̍ yajñEna# kalpatAṅq śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñEna# kalpatAM manO# yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MvAg yajñEna# kalpatA-mAtmA yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MyajñO yajñEna# kalpatAṃq suvar̍ dEvAṃ aganmAmRutA̍# aBUma prajApatEḥ̍ prajA aBUma̍ samahaM prajayA saM mayA̱ prajA samahaṃ rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ saM mayA# rAyaspOṣO&nnAya̍ tvA&nnAdyAya̍ tvA vAjAya̍ ( ) tvA vAjajityAyai̱ tvA &mRutamasi̍ puṣṭirasi̍ prajananamasi||39̍

verses.padam: (Padam) vAjasya|imam|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|suṣuvE|agrE̱|sOma̱m|rAjAnam|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su||tAḥ|asmaByamityasma - Byam|madhumatIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|Bavantu|vayam|rAṣṭrE|jAgriyAma|purOhitA̍ iti# puraḥ - hitAḥ||vAjasya|idam|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|Eti|baBUva|imA|ca|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|sarvata̍ḥ||saḥ|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|parIti|Eti|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|puṣṭi̱m|vad^^rdhayamAnaḥ|asmE̍ iti||vAja̍sya|imAm|prasava̍ iti# pra-savaḥ|śiśriyE|diva̱m|imA|ca|viśvA̱|BuvanAni|samrAḍiti̍# saM - rAṭ||adithsantam|dApayatu|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann|rayim|40 (50)
verses.samhita: vAjasyEmaM̍ prasavaḥ̍ suṣuvE̍ agrE sOmaṃq rAjAnamOṣa̍dhIṣvaPsu|tA̍ asmaByaM madhumatIr̍ Bavantu vayaṃ rAṣṭrE jA̱griyAma purOhitAḥ|vAja̍syEdaM̍ prasava̍ A baBUvEmA̍ ca viśvA BuvanAni̍ sarvataḥ|sa̍ virAjaM paryEti̍ prajAnan prajAM puṣṭiM̍ ~MvarddhayamAnO̍ asmE|vAjasyEmAM̍ prasavaḥ̍ śiśriyE̍ divamimA̍ ca viśvA BuvanAni̍ samrAṭ|adithsantaM̍ dApayatu prajAnan rayiM - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) ca|naḥ|sarvavIrAmiti̍ sarva# - vIrAm|nIti|yacCatu||agnE̱|acCa̍|vada|iha|naḥ|pratIti̍|naḥ|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|Bava||prEti|naḥ|yacCa|Buvaḥ|patE|dhanadA̍ iti# dhana - dAḥ|asi|naḥ|tvam||prEti|naḥ|yacCatu|aryamA|prEti̍|Baga̍ḥ|prEti̍|bRuhaspati̍ḥ||prEti̍|dEvAḥ|prEti̍|uta|sUnRutA̱|prEti̍|vAk|dEvI|dadAtu|naḥ||aryamaṇa̱m|bRuhaspati̱m|indra̱m|dAnA̍ya|cOdaya||vAca̱m|viṣṇu̱m|sara̍svatIm|savitAra̱m|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ca# naḥ sarvavIrAM̍ ni yacCatu||agnE̍ acCA# vadEha naḥ prati# naḥ sumanA# Bava|pra ṇO# yacCa BuvaspatE dhanadA asi̍ nastvaM||pra ṇO# yacCatvaryamA pra Bagaḥ pra bRuhaspatiḥ|pra̍ dEvAḥ prOta sUnRutA pra vAg dEvI dadAtu̍ naḥ||aryamaṇaM bRuhaspatimindraM dAnAya̍ cOdaya|vAcaM ~Mviṣṇuṃq sarasvatIṃ̍ savitAraM̍ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) ca|vAjina̱m||sOma̱m|rAjAnam|varu̍ṇam|agnim|anvAra̍BAmaha̍ ityanu̍ - AraBAmahE||AdityAn|viṣṇu̱m|sUrya̱m|brahmAṇa̱m|ca|bRuhaspati̱m||dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|sarasvatyai|vAcaḥ|yantuḥ|yantrEṇa̍|agnEḥ|tvA|sAmrA̱jyEnEti̍ sAM - rAjyEna|aBIti|si~jcAmi|indra̍sya|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|tvA|sAmrA̱jyEnEti̍ sAM - rAjyEna|aBIti|si~jcAmi||42̍ (36) (rayiṃ-savitAraṃq-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)(A10)̍
verses.samhita: ca vAjina̱M||sOmaṃq rAjAnaM̍ ~Mvaruṇamagni-manvAra̍BAmahE|AdityAn̍ viṣṇuṃq sUryaM̍ brahmAṇaM̍ ca bRuhaspati̱M||dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAṃq sarasvatyai̍ vAcO yantur yantrEṇAgnEstvA AmrA̱jyEnABiṣi~jcAmIndra̍sya̍ bRuhaspatE̱stvA sAmrA̱jyEnABiṣi~jcAmi||42̍ (rayiṃ-savitAraṃq-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agniḥ|EkA̱kṣarEṇEtyEka# -akṣarEṇa|vAca̱m|uditi|ajayat|aśvinau̱|dvya̍kṣarEṇEti̍ dvi - akṣarEṇa|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa- apAnau|uditi|ajayatAm|viṣṇu̍ḥ|trya̍kṣarEṇEti̍ tri - akṣarEṇa|trIn|lOkAn|uditi|ajayat|sOma̍ḥ|catu̍rakṣarEṇEti̍ catuḥ̍ - akṣarEṇa|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|paśUn|uditi|ajayat|pUṣA|pa~jcA̱kṣarEṇEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarEṇa|pa~gktim|uditi|ajayat|dhAtA|ṣaḍa̍kṣarEṇEti̍ ṣaṭ - akṣarEṇa|ṣaṭ|RutUn|uditi|ajayat|maruta̍ḥ|saptAkṣa̍rEṇEti̍# sapta - akṣarEṇa|saptapadAmiti̍# sapta - padAm|śakvarIm|uditi̍|ajayann|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|aṣṭAkṣa̍rEṇEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarEṇa|gAyatrIm|uditi|ajayat|mitraḥ|navA̱kṣarEṇEti̍ nava# - akṣarEṇa|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayat|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirEkA̱kṣarEṇa vAcamudajayadaśvinau̍ dvyakṣarEṇa̍ prAṇApAnAvudajayatAM̍ ~MviṣṇustyrakṣarEṇa̍ trIn ~MlOkAnudajayath̍ sOmaścaturakṣarEṇa̍ catuṣpadaḥ̍ paśUnudajayat̍ pUṣA pa~jcA̱kṣarEṇa pa~gktimudajayad̍ dhAtA ṣaḍakṣarEṇa̍ ṣaḍ-RutUnudajayan̍ marutaḥ̍ saptAkṣarEṇa̍ saptapadAṃq̍ śakvarImuda̍jayan̍ bRuhaspati-raṣṭAkṣa̍rEṇa̍ gAyatrImudajayan̍ mitrO navA̱kṣarEṇa trivRutaṅq stOmamudajayad-[̍ ] 43

verses.padam: (Padam) varuṇaḥ|daśA̱kṣarEṇEti̍ daśa# - akṣarEṇa|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|uditi|ajayat|indra̍ḥ|EkA̍daśAkṣarEṇEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|triṣṭuBa̱m|uditi|ajayat|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dvAda̍śAkṣarEṇEti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|jagatIm|uditi̍|ajayann|vasa̍vaḥ|trayO̍daśAkṣarEṇEti̍ trayOdaśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|trayOdaśamiti# trayaḥ - daśam|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayann|rudrAḥ|catu̍rdaśAkṣarEṇEti̍ caturdaśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|caturdaśamiti# catuḥ-daśam|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayann|AdityAḥ|pa~jca̍daśAkṣarEṇEti̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|pa~jcadaśamiti# pa~jca - daśam|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayaqnn|adi̍tiḥ|ṣOḍa̍śAkṣarEṇEti̍ ṣOḍaśa̍ - akṣarEṇa|ṣOḍaśam|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayat|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|saptadaśAkṣarEṇEti̍# saptadaśa-akṣarEṇa|saptadaśamiti̍# sapta - daśam|stOma̱m|uditi|ajayat||44̍ (46) (trivRutaṅq stOmamudajayath-ṣaṭca̍tvAriṃśacca)(A11)̍
verses.samhita: varuṇO̍ daśA̱kṣarEṇa virAja-mudajayadindra̍ EkAdaśAkṣarEṇa̍ triṣṭuBa-mudajayad̍ viśvE# dEvA dvAdaśAkṣarEṇa̍ jagatImuda̍jayan̍ vasavastrayO̍# daśAkṣarEṇa trayOdaśaṅ stOmamudajayan̍ rudrAścaturdaśAkṣarEṇa̍ caturdaśaṅ stOmamudajayannAdityAḥ̍ pa~jcadaśAkṣarEṇa̍ pa~jcadaśaṅ stOmamudajayannadi̍tiḥ̍ ṣOḍaśAkṣarEṇa̍ ṣOḍaśaṅ stOmamudajayat̍ prajApatiḥ̍ saptadaśAkṣarEṇa̍ saptadaśaṅ stOmamudajayat||44̍ (trivRutaṅq stOmamudajayath-ṣaṭca̍tvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|nRuṣadamiti# nRu-sada̱m|tvA|druṣadamiti# dru - sada̱m|Buvanasadamiti# Buvana - sada̱m|indrAya|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|aPsuṣadamityaPsu̍ - sada̱m|tvA|GRutasadamiti# GRuta - sada̱m|vyOmasadamiti# vyOma - sada̱m|indrAya|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|pRuthiviṣadamiti# pRuthivi - sada̱m|tvA|antarikṣasadamityantarikṣa̍ - sada̱m|nAkasadamiti# nAka - sada̱m|indrAya|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA||yE|grahA̱ḥ|pa~jcajanInA̍ iti# pa~jca - janInA̱ḥ|yEṣA̱m|tisraḥ|paramajA iti# parama - jAḥ||daivyaḥ|kOśa̍ḥ|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ nRuṣadaM̍ tvA druṣadaM̍ BuvanasadamindrAya̍ juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmyEṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvOpayAmagRuhItO&syaPsuṣada̍M̍ tvA GRutasadaM̍ ~MvyOmasadamindrAya̍ juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmyEṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvOpayAmagRuhItO&si̍ pRuthiviṣadaM̍ tvA&ntarikṣasadaM̍ nAkasadamindrAya̍ juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmyEṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA||yE grahA̱ḥ pa~jcajanInA yEṣA̱M tisraḥ paramajAḥ|daivyaḥ̍ kOśaḥ - [ ] 45

verses.padam: (Padam) samubjita̍ iti saM - ubjitaḥ||tEṣA̱m|viśipriyAṇAmiti̍ vi - śipriyAṇAm|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|samiti|agraBIm|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA||apAm|rasa̱m|udva̍yasamityut̍ - vayasam|sUryaraśmimiti̍ sUrya# - raśmim|samABRutamiti̍# saM - ABRutam||apAm|rasa̍sya|yaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|tam|vaḥ|gRuhṇAmI|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA||ayA|viṣṭhA̍ iti# vi-sthAḥ|janayann|karva̍rAṇi|saḥ|hi|GRuṇi̍ḥ|uruḥ|varA̍ya|gAtuḥ||saḥ|prati̍|uditi̍|ait|dharuṇa̍ḥ|maddhva̍ḥ|agra̱m|svAyA̱m|yat|tanuvA̱M̍ ( )|tanUm|airayata||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|tvA|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|tvA||46 (63)
verses.samhita: samubjitaḥ|tEṣAM̍ ~MviśipriyAṇA-miṣamUrjaṃq̍ samagraBI-mEṣa̍ tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA||apAṃ rasamudvayasaṃq̍ sUryaraśmiṃ̍ samABRutaM|apAṃ̍ rasasya̍ yO rasastaM ~MvO# gRuhṇAmyuttamamEṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA||ayA viṣṭhA janayan karvarAṇi̍ sa hi GRuṇirurur̍ varAya̍ gAtuḥ|sa pratyudai̱d dharuṇO maddhvO agraṅq svAyAM ~Myat tanuvA̱M ( ) tanUmairayata|upayAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ prajApatayE̍ tvA juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmyEṣa tE yOniḥ̍ prajApatayE̍ tvA||46

verses.padam: (Padam) anviti|aha̍|mAsA̱ḥ|anviti̍|it|vanA̍ni|anviti̍|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|anviti̍|parva̍tAsaḥ||anviti̍|indra̱m|rOda̍sI̍ iti|vAvaśAnE̍ iti|anviti̍|Apa̍ḥ|ajihata|jAya̍mAnam||anviti̍|tE|dAyi|mahE|indriyAya̍|satrA|tE|viśva̱m|anviti̍|vRutrahatya̍ iti# vRutra - hatyE̱||anviti|kṣatram|anviti̍|saha̍ḥ|yajatra|indra̍|dEvEBi̍ḥ|anviti̍|tE|nRuṣahya̍ iti# nRu - sahyE̱||indrAṇIm|Asu|nAriṣu|supatnImiti̍# su-patnI̱m|aham|aśravam||na|hi|asyAḥ|aparam|cana|jarasA̱|47 (50)
verses.samhita: anvaha mAsA anvidvanAnyanvOṣadhIranu̍ parvatAsaḥ|anvindraṃq̍ rOdasI̍ vAvaśAnE anvApO# ajihata jAyamAnaM||anu̍# tE dAyi maha indriyAya̍# satrA tE viśvamanu# vRutrahatyE̱|anu# kṣatramanu sahO# yajatrEndra# dEvEBiranu# tE nRuṣahyE̱||indrAṇImAsu nAriṣu̍ supatnI-mahama̍śravaM|na̍ hyasyA̍ aparaM cana jarasA - [ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) maratE|pati̍ḥ||na|aham|indrAṇi|rAraṇa|saKyu̍ḥ|vRuṣAka̍pEriti̍# vRuṣA - kapEḥ|RutE||yasya|idam|apya̱m|haviḥ|priyam|dEvEṣu̍|gacCa̍ti||yaḥ|jAtaḥ|Eva|prathamaḥ|mana̍svAn|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|kratu̍nA|paryaBU̍ṣaditi̍# pari - aBUṣat||yasya̍|śuṣmA̱t|rOda̍sI̍ iti|aBya̍sEtAm|nRuṇaMsya̍|mahnA|saḥ|janAsaḥ|indra̍ḥ||aiti̍|tE|mahaḥ|indra|UtI|ugra|sama̍nyava̍ iti sa - manyavaḥ|yat|samarantEti# saM - aranta|sEnA̱ḥ||patA̍ti|didyut|narya̍sya|bAhuvOḥ|mA|tE|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: maratE̍ patiḥ||nAhami̍ndrAṇi̍ rAraṇa saKyur̍ vRuṣAkapEṛ̍ RutE|yasyEdamapyaṃ# haviḥ priyaM dEvEṣu gacCati||yO̍ jAta Eva prathamO̍ manasvAn̍ dEvO dEvAn kratunA̍ paryaBUṣat|yasya̍ śuṣmAdrOdasI̍ aByasEtAM̍ nRuMṇasya# mahnA sa janAsa̍ indraḥ||A̍ tE# maha indrOtyu̍gra̍ samanyavO̍ yath samaranta̍ sEnA̱ḥ|patAti̍ didyunnaryasya̍ bAhuvOr mA tE - [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) manaḥ|viṣvadriyagiti̍# viṣva - driyak|vIti̍|cArIt||mA|naḥ|marddhIḥ|Eti̍|Bara|daddhi|tat|naḥ|prEti̍|dAśuṣE̱|dAta̍vE|BUri̍|yat|tE||navyE̱|dEṣṇE|śastE|asminn|tE|ukthE|prEti̍|bravAma|vayam|indra|stuvanta̍ḥ||Eti̍|tu|Bara|mAki̍ḥ|Etat|parIti̍|sthAt|vidma|hi|tvA|vasu̍patimiti̍ vasu# - patim|vasUnAm||indra̍|yat|tE|mAhi̍nam|datra̱m|asti̍|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|tat|haryaśvEti# hari - aśva|49 (50)
verses.samhita: manO# viṣvadriyag vi cArIt||mA̍ nO# marddhIrA BarA̍ daddhi tannaḥ pra dAśuṣE dAtavE̍ BUri yat tE̱|navyE# dEṣṇE śastE asmin ta# ukthE pra bravAma̍ vayamindra̍ stuvantaḥ||A̍ tU Bara̍ mAkirEtat̍ pari# ṣṭhAd vidmA hi tvA vasupatiM̍ ~MvasUnAM|indra̍ yat tE mAhinaM̍ datra-mastyasmaByaM taddharyaśva̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|yandhi||pradAtAramiti̍# pra - dAtAra̱m|havAmahE|indra̱m|Eti|haviṣA̱|vayam||uBA|hi|hastA̱|vasu̍nA|pRuṇasva̍|A|prEti̍|yacCa|dakṣi̍ṇAt|Eti̍|uta|savyAt||pradAtEti̍# pra - dAtA|vajrI|vRuṣaBaḥ|turAṣAṭ|śuṣmI|rAjA̱|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|sOmapAvEti# sOma - pAvA̱||asminn|yajñE|barqḥiṣi|Eti̍|niṣadyEti̍# ni - sadya|atha̍|Bava|yaja̍mAnAya|śam|yOḥ||indra̍ḥ|sutrAmEti̍# su - trAmA̱|svavAniti sva-vAn|avOBirityava̍ḥ̍ - Biḥ|sumRuḍIka iti# su - mRuḍIkaḥ|Bavatu|viśvavEdA̍ iti# viśva-vEdAḥ||bAdhatAm|dvEṣa̍ḥ|aBa̍yam|kRuṇOtu|suvIryasyEti̍# su - vIryasya|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pra yandhi||pradAtAraṃ̍# havAmaha indramA haviṣA# vayaM|uBA hi hastA vasunA̍ pRuṇasvA && pra yacCa̍ dakṣiṇAdOta̍ savyAt||pradAtA vajrI vRuṣaBastu̍rAṣAṭCuṣmI̍ rAjA# vRutrahA sOmapAvA̱|asmin.̍ yajñE barqḥiṣyA niṣadyAthA# Bava yajamAnAya̍ śaM ~MyOḥ||indraḥ̍ sutrAmA svavAṃq avOBiḥ̍ sumRuḍIkO Bavatu̍ viśvavEdAḥ|bAdha̍tAM̍ dvEṣO aBayaM̍ kRuṇOtu suvIryasya̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) patayaḥ|syAma||tasya̍|vayam|sumatAviti̍# su-matau|yajñiyasya|apIti̍|BadrE|saumanasE|syAma||saḥ|sutrAmEti̍# su - trAmA̱|svavAniti sva-vAn|indraḥ|asmE̍ iti|ArAt|cit|dvEṣa̍ḥ|sanutaḥ|yuyOtu||rEvatI̱ḥ|naḥ|sadhamAda̍ iti# sadha - mAdaḥ|indrE̱|santu|tuvivA̍jA̍ iti# tuvi - vAjAḥ||kṣumantaḥ|yABi̍ḥ|madE̍ma||prO̍ iti|sviti̍|asmai|purOrathamiti̍# puraḥ - ratham|indrAya|śUṣam|arcata||aBIkE̱|cit|u|lOkakRuditi̍# lOka - kRut|sa~ggE|samathsviti# samat - su|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA||asmAka̱m|bOdhi|cOditA|naBantAm|anyakEṣA̱m||jyAkAḥ|adhIti̍# ( )|dhanvasviti dhanva# - su||51 (51) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 13 Anuvaakams :- (pAkayajñaṃ-saṅśravAḥ-parOkṣa̍M-baṛhiṣO&haM-dhruvA-maganmEtyA̍ha̍ - dEva# savita-rdEvasyAhaM-kṣatrasyOlbaM-~MvAjasyEma-magnirEkA̱kṣarEṇO-payAmagRu̍hItO&-syanvaha̍ mAsA-strayOdaśa)̍ KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (pAkayajñaM-parOkṣaM-dhruvAM-~Mvi̍ sRujatE-ca̍ naḥ sarvavIrAM̍ - patayaḥ̍ syO-maikapa~jcAśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śeventh Prasnam :- (pAkayajñaM-dhanvasu|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: patayaḥ̍ syAma||tasya# vayaṃ sumatau̍ yajñiyasyApi# BadrE saumanasE̍ syAma|sa̍ sutrAmA svavAṃq indrO# asmE ArAccid-dvEṣaḥ̍ sanutar yuyOtu||rEvatI̱r̍ naḥ sadhamAda indrE# santu tuvivAjAḥ|kṣumantO̍ yABir madEma||prOṣva̍smai̍ purOrathamindrAya̍ śUṣamarcata|aBIkE̍# cidu lOkakRuth sa~ggE samathsu# vRutrahA|asmAkaM̍ bOdhi cOditA naBantA-manyakEṣA̱M|jyAkA̍ adhi ( ) dhanvasu||51̍ praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 13 anuvAkams :- (pAkayajñaṃ-saṅśravAḥ-parOkṣa̍M-barqḥiṣO&haM̍ -dhruvA-maganmEtyAha̍ -dEva# savitar-dEvasyAhaM-kṣatrasyOlaṅqM-~MvAjasyEma-magnirEkA̱kṣarEṇO̍ -payAmagRuhItO&-syanvaha̍ mAsA-strayOdaśa|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (pAkayajñaM-parOkṣaM-dhruvAM-~Mvi̍ sRujatE-ca̍ naḥ sarvavIrAM̍ - patayaḥ̍ syO-maikapa~jcAśat|)̍ first and last padam ff śeventh praśnam :- (pAkayajñaM-dhanvasu|)||hari̍# OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------------------ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.8 prathamakAṇḍE aṣamaḥ praśnaḥ -
